1: The Lord has built his city on the holy mountain.
2: He loves the city of Zion more than all the other places where the people of Jacob live.
3: City of God, the Lord says glorious things about you.
4: He says, “I will include Egypt and Babylon in a list of nations who recognize me as king. I will also include Philistia and Tyre, along with Cush. I will say about them, 'They were born in Zion.' ”
5: Certainly it will be said about Zion, “This nation and that nation were born in it. The Most High God himself will make it secure.”
6: Here is what the Lord will write in his list of the nations. “Each of them was born in Zion.”
7: As they make music they will sing, “Zion, all our blessings come from you.”
